headline: Buy, Hold, or Fade the Recent Rally in UnitedHealth Group (UNH) Stock?
summary: UnitedHealth Group (UNH) stock is still down 40% YTD but has surged more than +20% this month following reports that Warren Buffett, and other billionaire hedge fund managers have taken a stake in the company.

headline: Transparency Declaration Notification
summary: Regulated information In accordance with the requirements of Article 14 of the Belgian Law of May 2, 2007 on the disclosure of significant shareholdings in listed companies, Ontex Group NV (“Ontex”) discloses the notifications of significant shareholdings by the Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., that it has received on August 13 and 14, 2025. On August 7, 2025, the Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., detained 2,559,642 Ontex voting rights or equivalent financial instruments, representing 3.11% of voting rights,

On August 7, 2025, the Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., detained 2,559,642 Ontex voting rights or equivalent financial instruments, representing 3.11% of voting rights,

headline: Goldman Sachs predicts major slowdown in future jobs reports
summary: Goldman Sachs (GS) is forecasting that the next jobs report will show only 30,000 jobs added to the labor market, a steep slowdown. Callie Cox, Ritholtz Wealth Management chief market strategist, explains why stagnant labor supply could keep unemployment low while also signaling deeper concerns for economic growth. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

summary: Goldman economists warn job growth is stalling, and the slowdown could deepen.

headline: Market Minute 8-18-25- Washington War Talks Take Center Stage
summary: Stocks are mostly flat to start the week. Gold, silver, and crude oil are climbing modestly along with Treasuries. The dollar is up a bit, too, while most major cryptocurrencies are down a couple of percentage points.

headline: Access Point Financial Purchases $98 Million of $653 Million Atrium Hotels Refinancing
summary: ATLANTA, August 18, 2025--Access Point Financial purchased $98 million of the H and the JRR risk retention bond classes.

headline: Goldman Sachs sees Fed cutting 3 times this year
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs said in a note Monday that it expects the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates three times before the end of the year, citing a sharp slowdown in U.S. job growth.

raw.headline: Goldman Sachs sees Fed cutting 3 times this year
